title: Trump's Crypto Evolution: From 'Scam' to Empire (2017-2025)
description: Document Trump's systematic transformation from cryptocurrency skeptic to crypto empire operator, tracking the strategic realization, infrastructure development, and coordination with oligarchic networks.
research_areas: What specific events triggered Trump's shift from crypto skeptic to supporter?
Which advisors and networks influenced his crypto strategy development?
How did Truth Social and other platforms provide crypto infrastructure?
What role did Peter Thiel's network play in the crypto transformation?
How did legal and financial pressures accelerate crypto adoption?
source_requirements: Social media posts, platform development records, advisor communications, legal strategy documents
pdf_source: The Capture Cascade - Part 5_ The Breakthrough.pdf
